title: Maung Thar Sein
subtitle:
UN delegation arrives in Sittwe

 The UN Special Rapporteur on the Special Rapporteur on Burma arrived in Sittwe, Rakhine State, at 6 pm today.

 The Special Rapporteur will visit the refugees in Maungdaw and Pauktaw Townships in northern Rakhine State tomorrow and will return pic.twitter.com/pfweWxK3xv
